EmailTemplate.subject: Stop by the TriTech Booth at the Atlantic Chapter APCO Fall Conference, October 24-26
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Atlantic Chapter APCO Fall Conference October 24-26, 2011 | Rockport, ME
Stop by and see us next week at the Atlantic Chapter APCO Fall Conference and visit with TriTech-Imc Solutions Client Account Manager, Mark Baranowski and Sales Representative, Dennis Noe.
Mark Baranowski Mark.Baranowski@TriTech.com 774-551-9180
Dennis Noe Dennis.Noe@TriTech.com 774-551-9114
If you would like to pre-schedule a demonstration of our CAD, Mobile Data, Civil Process, Corrections or Records Management solutions, please call or email TriTech today.
Enter to Win a Law Monopoly Game at the TriTech Booth
Stop by and visit with us to see why TriTech is the fastest growing company in Public Safety and Medical Transport.
Can't make the conference in Rockport, ME next week? Call us at 774-551-9180.
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com
This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121
